Namespace Harmony

Classes

AccessTools

The access tools.

CodeInstruction

A high level wrapper for a IL code and its operand

CodeMatch

Defines a matching condition for a CodeInstruction

CodeMatcher

A chainable class to do search/replace operations on list of CodeInstruction. Usually from within a transpiler

CollectionExtensions

A collection extensions.

A delegate type factory.
